register.info: Your ID is being scanned securely. No data is stored without your consent. Please keep the document visible and well-lit.
register.retake-photo: ID scan failed. No data was stored. Please check lighting and clarity, then try again.

login.no-face: Face not recognized. Please try again, making sure your face is clearly visible and unobstructed.
